text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    2543-7Lactate dehydrogenase 3 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    2545-2Lactate dehydrogenase 4/Lactate dehydrogenase.total in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    14119-2Lactate dehydrogenase 1/Lactate dehydrogenase 2 [Enzymatic activity ratio] in Serum or Plasma
    2540-3Lactate dehydrogenase 2 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    2546-0Lactate dehydrogenase 4 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    14804-9Lactate dehydrogenase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Lactate to pyruvate reaction

    2535-3Lactate dehydrogenase 1 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Chemical separation
    2542-9Lactate dehydrogenase 3/Lactate dehydrogenase.total in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    2547-8Lactate dehydrogenase 5 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Chemical separation
    19248-4Lactate dehydrogenase 2 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    2548-6Lactate dehydrogenase 5/Lactate dehydrogenase.total in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    2544-5Lactate dehydrogenase 4 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Chemical separation
    2538-7Lactate dehydrogenase 2 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Chemical separation
    2549-4Lactate dehydrogenase 5 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    2536-1Lactate dehydrogenase 1/Lactate dehydrogenase.total in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    14805-6Lactate dehydrogenase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Pyruvate to lactate reaction
    2537-9Lactate dehydrogenase 1 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    5910-5Lactate dehydrogenase isoenzymes [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma
    2541-1Lactate dehydrogenase 3 [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Chemical separation
    2539-5Lactate dehydrogenase 2/Lactate dehydrogenase.total in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1

    6111LDH
    6114LDH 3-Mayo
